example.text: The attacks on the abortion pill are a concerted effort by anti-choice extremists to limit women's reproductive freedom, and we can't stand for it. I joined my [[user]] colleagues on an amicus brief urging the Fifth Circuit to reject these far-right, extreme attacks on women. [[url]]

Every community in Nevada deserves quality infrastructure, services, and support. That's why I'm working with Sen. [[user]] on the bipartisan MORE Grants Package to invest in rural Nevada and create opportunities across our state.

Before I passed the Brian Neuman Act, wounded veterans were forced to reapply for clothing benefits every single year, even though the VA knew they still needed them. I made that renewal automatic, and I’m continuing to fight to secure our veterans’ hard-earned benefits.
I said what I said. Stop playing games with our military [[user]]. [[url]]

I'm joining my Senate colleagues on a resolution to mark today as National Asian American, Native Hawaiian and Pacific Islander Mental Health Day. AANHPI Nevadans face barriers to mental health resources and we must continue to push so every Nevadan can get the care they need.

Before I passed the Brian Neuman Act, wounded veterans were forced to reapply for clothing benefits every single year, even though the VA knew they still needed them. I made that renewal automatic, and I’m continuing to fight to secure our veterans’ hard-earned benefits.
